title: Two Nominations and One Withdrawal Sent to the Senate Today – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
July 24, 2018
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Tamara Bonzanto, of New Jersey, to be an Assistant Secretary of Veterans Affairs (Office of Accountability and Whistleblower Protection), vice Donald P. Loren, resigning.J. Nicholas Ranjan, of Pennsylvania, to be United States District Judge for the Western District of Pennsylvania, vice Kim R. Gibson, retired.WITHDRAWAL SENT TO THE SENATE:Ryan Wesley Bounds, of Oregon, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Ninth Circuit, vice Diarmuid F. O’Scannlain, retired, which was sent to the Senate on January 8, 2018.
